summary: This bill, S.748, reaffirms the applicability of the Indian Reorganization Act to the Lytton Rancheria of California. It clarifies that the Secretary of the Interior can acquire and hold land in trust for the tribe, and that such land will become part of the reservation and be managed according to standard trust regulations. The bill aims to ensure the Lytton Rancheria can benefit from the provisions of the Indian Reorganization Act.
